data.title: International Shakespeare Festival Bucharest
data.meta_description: THE PROGRAMME OF THE INTERNATIONAL SHAKESPEARE FESTIVAL IN BUCHAREST April 30th - July 12th 2012   Monday, April 30th   ODEON THEATRE - BIG STAGE - 19:00 HAMLET Kolyada Theatre -  Ekaterinburg (Russia) Director: Nikolai Kolyada Tuesday, May 1st   BULANDRA THEATRE - THE TOMA CARAGIU STAGE - 11:00 TEXT, ACTION,…
data.text:
THE PROGRAMME OF THE INTERNATIONAL SHAKESPEARE FESTIVAL IN BUCHAREST April 30th – July 12th 2012

Monday, April 30th

ODEON THEATRE – BIG STAGE – 19:00

HAMLET

Kolyada Theatre – Ekaterinburg (Russia)

Director: Nikolai Kolyada

Tuesday, May 1st

BULANDRA THEATRE – THE TOMA CARAGIU STAGE – 11:00

TEXT, ACTION, RELATIONS

Work technics and methods at the Odin Theatre in Holstebro (Denmark)

Presenting: Tage Larsen and Julia VarleyWith the participation of: Eugenio Barba

BULANDRA THEATRE – THE LIVIU CIULEI STAGE – 19:00

ROMEO AND JULIET

The Vilnius Municipal Theatre (Lithuania)

Director: Oskaras Korsunovas

Wednesday, May 2nd

BULANDRA THEATRE -THE TOMA CARAGIU STAGE – 17:00

MEETING WITH EUGENIO BARBA

Book launch: ”ON DIRECTING AND DRAMATURGY: BURNING THE HOUSE”

by Eugenio Barba (Editura Nemira)

BULANDRA THEATRE – THE TOMA CARAGIU STAGE – 19:00

ORO DE OTELLO

Odin Teatret in Holstebro (Denmark)

Director: Eugenio Barba
